import "./header.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faBed, faCalendar, faCalendarDays, faCar, faPerson, faPlane, faTaxi, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { DateRange } from "react-date-range"; import { useState } from "react"; import "react-date-range/dist/styles.css"; // main css file import "react-date-range/dist/theme/default.css"; // theme css file import { format } from "date-fns"; const Header = () => { const [openDate, setOpenDate] = useState(false); const [date, setDate] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: "selection", }, ]); const [openOptions, setOpenOptions] = useState(false); const [Options, setOptions] = useState({ adult: 1, children: 0, rom: 1, }); const handleOption = (name, operation) => { setOpenOptions((prev) => { return; }); }; return (

setOpenDate(!openDate)} className="headerSearchText" >{`${format(date[0].startDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")} to ${format( date[0].endDate, "MM/dd/yyyy" )} `} {openDate && ( setDate([item.selection])} moveRangeOnFirstSelection={false} ranges={date} className="date" /> )}
{`${Options.adult} adult.${Options.children} children.${Options.rom} rom`}

); }; export default Header;
